titles.title: Break Thou The Bread Of Life

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Bb/C
Break Thou the bread of life
Dear Lord to me
As Thou didst break
The loaves beside the sea

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Beyond the sacred page
I seek Thee Lord
My spirit pants for Thee
O Living Word

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Thou art the Bread of Life
O Lord to me
Thy holy Word the truth
That saveth me

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Give me to eat and live
With Thee above
Teach me to love Thy truth
For Thou art love

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O send Thy Spirit
Lord now unto me
That He may touch my eyes
And make me see

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Show me the truth
Concealed within Thy Word
And in Thy book revealed
I see Thee Lord

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Bless Thou the truth
Dear Lord to me to me
As Thou didst bless
The bread by Galilee

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Then shall all bondage cease
All fetters fall
And I shall find my peace
My All in all
